items.name: Component_MessageBehavior
items.content:
# ===================================================================
#
#   Script: Component_MessageBehavior
#
#   $$COPYRIGHT$$
#
# ===================================================================
###*
* An enumeration of game message modes.
*
* ADV - Adventure Mode
* NVL - Novel Mode
*
* @typedef MessageMode
* @memberof vn
###
class MessageMode
    @ADV = 0
    @NVL = 1
    
vn.MessageMode = MessageMode


class Component_MessageBehavior extends gs.Component
    @objectCodecBlackList = ["onMessageWaiting", "onMessageFinish"]
    
    ###*
    * Called if this object instance is restored from a data-bundle. It can be used
    * re-assign event-handler, anonymous functions, etc.
    * 
    * @method onDataBundleRestore.
    * @param Object data - The data-bundle
    * @param gs.ObjectCodecContext context - The codec-context.
    ###
    onDataBundleRestore: (data, context) ->
        @tempSettings = GameManager.tempSettings
        @setupEventHandlers()
        
    ###*
    * A behavior-component to define the behavior of a game-message.
    *
    * @module vn
    * @class Component_MessageBehavior
    * @extends gs.Component
    * @memberof vn
    * @constructor
    ###
    constructor: ->
        ###*
        * Reference to game settings.
        * @property settings
        * @type Object
        * @protected
        ###
        @settings = GameManager.settings
        ###*
        * Reference to temporary game settings.
        * @property settings
        * @type Object
        * @protected
        ###
        @tempSettings = GameManager.tempSettings
        
        ###*
        * Indicates if the message is currently waiting.
        * @property isWaiting
        * @type boolean
        * @readOnly
        ###
        @isWaiting = no
        
        ###*
        * Indicates if the message is currently running.
        * @property isRunning
        * @type boolean
        * @readOnly
        ###
        @isRunning = no
        
        ###*
        * Indicates if a voice is currently playing together with the message.
        * @property isVoicePlaying
        * @type boolean
        * @readOnly
        ###
        @isVoicePlaying = no
        
        ###*
        * Current message caret/cursor position.
        * @property caretPosition
        * @type gs.Point
        * @readOnly
        ###
        @caretPosition = new gs.Point(0, 0)
        
        ###*
        * Current raw message text.
        * @property message
        * @type string
        * @readOnly
        ###
        @message = ""
        
        ###*
        * All currently displayed raw messages.
        * @property messages
        * @type string[]
        * @readOnly
        ###
        @messages = []
        
        ###*
        * Voice associated with the current message.
        * @property voice
        * @type gs.AudioBufferReference
        ###
        @voice = null
        
        ###*
        * Indicates if current message is partial. DEPRECATED. Please do not use.
        * @property partial
        * @deprecated
        * @type boolean
        * @readOnly
        ###
        @partial = no
        
        ###*
        * Indicates if the message is currently waiting in live-preview.
        * @property waitingPreview
        * @type boolean
        * @readOnly
        ###
        @waitingPreview = no
        
        ###*
        * Indicates if the auto-message is enabled.
        * @property autoMessageEnabled
        * @type boolean
        * @readOnly
        ###
        @autoMessageEnabled = no
      
        @onMessageFinish = (sender) =>
            @object.events.emit "finish", this
            
            if @object.settings.autoErase or @object.settings.paragraphSpacing > 0
                @message = ""
            
        @onMessageWaiting = (sender) =>
            if !@object.textRenderer.isBatched() or !@object.textRenderer.isBatchInProgress()
                @object.textRenderer.waitAtEnd = !@partial
                @object.events.emit "waiting", this
    ###*
    * Adds event-handlers
    *
    * @method setupEventHandlers
    ### 
    setupEventHandlers: ->
        @object.events.offByOwner("messageFinish", this)
        @object.events.offByOwner("messageWaiting", this)
        
        @object.events.on "messageFinish", gs.CallBack("onMessageFinish", this), null, this
        @object.events.on "messageWaiting", gs.CallBack("onMessageWaiting", this), null, this
            
        gs.GlobalEventManager.offByOwner("previewWaiting", this)
        gs.GlobalEventManager.offByOwner("previewRestart", this)
                
        gs.GlobalEventManager.on "previewWaiting", ((sender) =>
            @waitingPreview = yes
        ), null, this
        
        gs.GlobalEventManager.on "previewRestart", ((sender) =>
            @waitingPreview = no
        ), null, this
        
    ###*
    * Setup the component. Adds event handlers.
    *
    * @method setup
    ###
    setup: ->
        @setupEventHandlers()
     
    ###*
    * Disposes the component.
    *
    * @method toDataBundle
    ###   
    dispose: ->
        super
        
        gs.GlobalEventManager.offByOwner("previewWaiting", this)
        gs.GlobalEventManager.offByOwner("previewRestart", this)
                
    ###*
    * Not implemented yet.
    *
    * @method toDataBundle
    ###
    toDataBundle: ->
    ###*
    * Not implemented yet.
    *
    * @method restore
    * @param {Object} bundle - A data bundle.
    ###    
    restore: (bundle) ->
        
    ###*
    * Action to show a game message.
    *
    * @method showMessage
    * @param {Object} sender - The sender of this action.
    * @param {Object} params - An object containing the necessary parameters.
    ###
    showMessage: (sender, params) ->
        gs.GameNotifier.postContextChange(lcsm(params.message))
        
        @partial = params.partial
                
        @message += lcsm(params.message)
        
        @addMessage(params.message, RecordManager.characters[params.characterId], @object.settings.paragraphSpacing > 0, !@partial)
        
        if @object.textRenderer.isBatched()
            @object.textRenderer.waitAtEnd = yes
        else
            @object.textRenderer.waitAtEnd = !@partial
            
        
    ###*
    * Deprecated. Not longer used.
    *
    * @method updateBitmap
    ###
    updateBitmap: ->
        if !@object.bitmap or @object.bitmap.width != @object.dstRect.width or @object.bitmap.height != @object.dstRect.height
            @object.bitmap?.dispose()
            @object.bitmap = new Bitmap(@object.dstRect.width, @object.dstRect.height)
            @object.bitmap.font = @object.font
          
    ###*
    * Restores a NVL game message of an array of message-objects. That is
    * necessary to restore a NVL game message from a save-game.
    *
    * @method restoreMessages
    * @param {Array} messages - An array of messages to restore.
    ###
    restoreMessages: (messages) ->
        @updateBitmap()
        @clear()
        
        @object.opacity = 255
        @object.srcRect = new Rect(0, 0, @object.dstRect.width, @object.dstRect.height)
        
        for message in messages
            @object.font.color = new Color(message.character?.textColor || Color.WHITE)
            @object.textRenderer.drawFormattedTextImmediately(0, 0, @object.dstRect.width, @object.dstRect.height, lcsm(message.text ? message), yes)

        return null
        
    ###*
    * Adds a new message.
    * 
    * @method addMessage
    * @param {string} message - The message.
    * @param {Object} character - Database-Record of a character.
    * @param {boolean} newLine - Indicates if the message should make a line break.
    ###
    addMessage: (message, character, newLine, waitAtEnd) ->
        @object.textRenderer.partialMessage = null
        @object.offset = x: 0, y: 0
        @object.visible = yes
        
        @object.messages.push({ text: message, character: character})
        
        @object.textRenderer.waitAtEnd = waitAtEnd
        if not @object.settings.autoErase
            @object.textRenderer.currentY += @object.settings.paragraphSpacing
        if newLine
            @object.textRenderer.newLine()
        @updateBitmap()
            
        if character? and @object.settings.useCharacterColor
            @object.font.color = new Color(character?.textColor || Color.WHITE)
            
        @object.opacity = 255
        @object.srcRect = new Rect(0, 0, @object.dstRect.width, @object.dstRect.height)
     
        @update()
        @object.textRenderer.drawFormattedText(0, 0, @object.dstRect.width, @object.dstRect.height, message, yes)

    ###*
    * Clears the game message by deleting/clearing all messages.
    *
    * @method clear
    ###
    clear: -> 
        @object.textRenderer.clear()
        @object.messages = []
        @message = ""
        
    ###*
    * Closes the game message by making it invisible.
    *
    * @method close
    ###
    close: -> 
        @object.visible = no
    
    ###*
    * Gets the duration of an associated voice or 0 if no voice is associated.
    *
    * @method voiceDuration
    * @return {number} The duration in frames.
    ###
    voiceDuration: ->
        duration = 0
        if @voice? and (@settings.autoMessage.waitForVoice or @settings.timeMessageToVoice)
            duration = Math.round((@voice.source.buffer.duration * (1.0 / @voice.source.playbackRate.value)) * 1000 / 16.6)
        else
            duration = 0
            
        return if @tempSettings.skip then 1 else duration
        
    ###*
    * Gets the duration of rendering the game-message.
    *
    * @method messageDuration
    * @return {number} The duration in frames.
    ###
    messageDuration: -> 
        duration = @object.textRenderer.calculateDuration()
        
        return if @tempSettings.skip then 1 else duration
        
    ###*
    * Gets the time between two messages in auto-read mode.
    *
    * @method autoMessageTime
    * @return {number} The time in frames.
    ###
    autoMessageTime: -> 
        if @tempSettings.skip
            return 1
        else
            return Math.max(Math.round(@settings.autoMessage.time * Graphics.frameRate), @voiceDuration() - @messageDuration())
    
    ###*
    * Gets the current message speed.
    *
    * @method messageSpeed
    * @return {number} The message speed.
    ###
    messageSpeed: -> Math.max(11 - Math.round(GameManager.settings.messageSpeed * 2.5), 0)
    
    ###*
    * Checks if a mouse-button or key was pressed to continue with the message-rendering.
    *
    * @method actionTrigger
    * @return {boolean} If true, the an action-button or action-key is pressed.
    ###
    actionTrigger: -> (gs.ObjectManager.current.input and @object.visible and @object.dstRect.contains(Input.Mouse.x - @object.origin.x, Input.Mouse.y - @object.origin.y) and Input.Mouse.buttons[Input.Mouse.LEFT] == 2) or Input.trigger(Input.C)
    
    finish: ->
        #@object.character = null
        
        if @object.voice? and GameManager.settings.skipVoiceOnAction
            AudioManager.stopSound(@object.voice.name)
    
    erase: ->
        fading = GameManager.tempSettings.messageFading
        duration = if GameManager.tempSettings.skip then 0 else fading.duration
        
        @object.animator.disappear(fading.animation, fading.easing, duration, =>
            SceneManager.scene.currentCharacter = { name: "" }
            @clear()
            @object.visible = no
        )
        
    ###*
    * FIXME: Deprecated? It is also a re-definition of gs.Component_Visual.updateOrigin.
    *
    * @method updateOrigin
    ###
    updateOrigin: ->
        ox = 0
        oy = 0
        if @object.parent? and @object.parent.dstRect?
            p = @object.parent
            while p? and p.dstRect?
                ox += p.dstRect.x
                oy += p.dstRect.y
                p = p.parent
                    
        @object.origin.x = ox
        @object.origin.y = oy
        
    ###*
    * Updates the object. 
    *
    * @method updateObject
    * @private
    ###
    updateObject: ->
        @updateOrigin()
        
        if @tempSettings.skip and not @waitingPreview
            @object.textRenderer.isWaiting = no
    
    ###*
    * Updates the message.
    *
    * @method updateMessage
    * @private
    ###
    updateMessage: ->
        @caretPosition = @object.textRenderer.caretPosition
        
        if @tempSettings.skip and (@settings.allowSkipUnreadMessages or GameManager.globalData.messages[@message]?.read)
            @object.textRenderer.drawImmediately = yes
            @object.textRenderer.waitAtEnd = @waitingPreview
            @object.textRenderer.waitAtEndTime = 0
        else
            @object.textRenderer.drawImmedialty = no
            @updateSpeed()
            @updateAutoMessage()
            
    ###*
    * Updates the speed of the message. That depends on game-settings if a message
    * is timed to its voice or not.
    *
    * @method updateSpeed
    * @private
    ###
    updateSpeed: ->
        voiceDuration = @voiceDuration()
        if voiceDuration > 0 and @settings.timeMessageToVoice
            @object.textRenderer.speed = voiceDuration / @message.length
        else
            @object.textRenderer.speed = @messageSpeed()
            
    ###*
    * Update auto-read mode.
    *
    * @method updateAutoMessage
    * @private
    ###
    updateAutoMessage: ->
        if @settings.autoMessage.stopOnAction and @actionTrigger()
            @settings.autoMessage.enabled = no
            
        if @settings.autoMessage.enabled and not @partial
            if @object.textRenderer.waitAtEnd
                @object.textRenderer.isWaiting = no
            @object.textRenderer.waitAtEndTime = @autoMessageTime()
            @object.textRenderer.waitAtEnd = no
        else if @autoMessageEnabled != @settings.autoMessage.enabled
            @object.textRenderer.waitAtEnd = yes
            @object.textRenderer.waitAtEndTime = 0
            
        @autoMessageEnabled = @settings.autoMessage.enabled
            
    ###
    * Updates the game message behavior
    *
    * @method update
    ###
    update: ->
        @object.needsUpdate = yes
        @updateObject()
        @updateMessage()
        
        if @character != @object.character   
            gs.GlobalEventManager.emit("talkingEnded", this, character: @character)
            @character = @object.character
            
        if @object.textRenderer.isWaiting != @isWaiting or @object.textRenderer.isRunning != @isRunning or (@voice?.playing && (!@object.character?.timeTalkingToVoiceVolume or @voice.averageVolume > @object.character.talkingVolume)) != @isVoicePlaying
            @isWaiting = @object.textRenderer.isWaiting
            @isRunning = @object.textRenderer.isRunning
            @isVoicePlaying = (@voice?.playing && (!@object.character?.timeTalkingToVoiceVolume or @voice.averageVolume > @object.character.talkingVolume))
            
            if not @tempSettings.skip
                if @voice?.playing
                    if not @isVoicePlaying
                        gs.GlobalEventManager.emit("talkingEnded", this, character: @object.character)
                    else
                        gs.GlobalEventManager.emit("talkingStarted", this, character: @object.character)
                else
                    if @isWaiting
                        gs.GlobalEventManager.emit("talkingEnded", this, character: @object.character)
                    else if @isRunning
                        gs.GlobalEventManager.emit("talkingStarted", this, character: @object.character)
        
        if @object.layoutRect? and @object.parent?.dstRect?
            if @object.layoutRect.x then @object.dstRect.x = @object.layoutRect.x(@object.parent.dstRect.width)
            if @object.layoutRect.y then @object.dstRect.y = @object.layoutRect.y(@object.parent.dstRect.height)
            if @object.layoutRect.width then @object.dstRect.width = @object.layoutRect.width(@object.parent.dstRect.width)
            if @object.layoutRect.height then @object.dstRect.height = @object.layoutRect.height(@object.parent.dstRect.height)
vn.Component_MessageBehavior = Component_MessageBehavior
